quiz.question: Śani is nīca in which Rāśi?
quiz.explanation: Śani is debilitated (nīca) in Meṣa Rāśi and exalted (uccha) in Tulā Rāśi.

quiz.question: Guru attains uccha in which Rāśi?
quiz.explanation: Guru is exalted (uccha) in Karkaṭa Rāśi and debilitated (nīca) in Makara Rāśi.

quiz.question: Maṅgala has special dṛṣṭi on which bhāvas from its placement?
quiz.explanation: Maṅgala has special aspects (dṛṣṭi) on the 4th and 8th bhāvas in addition to the 7th.

quiz.question: Śukra attains uccha in which Rāśi?
quiz.explanation: Śukra is exalted in Mīna Rāśi and debilitated in Kanyā Rāśi.

quiz.question: For Karkaṭa Lagna, which Graha is yogakāraka?
quiz.explanation: For Karkaṭa Lagna, Maṅgala rules the 5th and 10th bhāvas, making it a yogakāraka.

quiz.question: Rāhu placed in Mithuna Rāśi generally behaves similar to which Graha?
quiz.explanation: Rāhu tends to behave like the lord of the Rāśi it occupies; in Mithuna, it acts similar to Budha.

quiz.question: Sūrya is nīca in which Rāśi?
quiz.explanation: Sūrya is debilitated in Tulā Rāśi and exalted in Meṣa Rāśi.

quiz.question: Guru–Candra Gaja Keśarī Yoga is strongest when placed in which bhāvas?
quiz.explanation: Gaja Keśarī Yoga gives strongest results when Guru and Candra are placed in Kendras.

quiz.question: Śani has special dṛṣṭi on which bhāvas from its placement?
quiz.explanation: Śani has special aspects on the 3rd and 10th bhāvas in addition to the 7th.

quiz.question: Candra is nīca in which Rāśi?
quiz.explanation: Candra is debilitated in Vṛścika Rāśi and exalted in Vṛṣabha Rāśi.
